summary: Medical app with doctor registration flow. After registration, doctors should see their Registration ID and Code, then be redirected to login page instead of dashboard.
architectural_notes: Doctor registration flow: after registration, show Registration ID and Code, then redirect to login page (not dashboard)

existing_features.title: After a doctor successfully completes registration, display their generated Registration ID and Code in a confirmation screen or modal so they can save them before proceeding.

After the doctor acknowledges their credentials on the confirmation screen, redirect them to the login page (not the dashboard). Remove any automatic post-registration redirect to the doctor dashboard.

Ensure the DoctorPortal login form is the only entry point to the doctor dashboard. If a doctor navigates to the doctor route without an active login session, they must see the login form, not the dashboard.

projectName: Fix doctor registration flow to show credentials before redirecting to login
